articles.title: 'If you harm an American...': Joe Biden warns as US bombs Iraq, Syria after 3 soldiers die in Jordan | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The US military launches air strikes on Iranian-backed militias in Iraq and Syria, in response to the drone attack at Tower 22 that killed three US soldiers.
articles.content: US President Joe Biden has warned if militants harm an American, they will hit back" amid several incidents including the Tower 22 drone attack that killed US soldiers, Red Sea attacks by Houthi mili… [+2520 chars]

articles.author: Carrie Hodgin
articles.title: National 'Wear Red Day' is here and this is how you can support women fighting heart disease - WXII12 Winston-Salem
articles.description: National "Wear Red Day" is Friday, Feb. 2, and it aims to raise awareness of the leading cause of death in women, which is cardiovascular disease, according to the American Heart Association.
articles.content: WINSTON-SALEM, N.C. —National "Wear Red Day" is Friday, Feb. 2, and it aims to raise awareness of the leading cause of death in women, which is cardiovascular disease, according to the American Heart… [+779 chars]
